topics: The Nature of Satan and Demonic Forces
Indwelling of the Holy Spirit in Believers
The Word of God as Offensive Weapon
The Role of Prayer and Intercession
bibleStories: The Crossing of the Red Sea
sentimentFlow: The sermon starts heavy, building tension with urgent warnings about an invisible enemy attacking marriages, families, and faith, evoking fear, weariness, and battle fatigue. It shifts to an empowering middle, detailing practical tools like truth, faith, and prayer to stand firm and fight back with confidence. It ends light, with a communal prayer affirming divine protection, strength, and ultimate victory, leaving a tone of hope and relief.
